sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PPMDebug</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Debug Logger for PPM, Use this for logging Debug Messages</description>
        <name>PPMDebug</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PPMDebug = Class.create();
PPMDebug.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'PPMDebug'
};

PPMDebug.PROJECT_DEBUG_PROPERTY = 'com.snc.pm.debug.enable';

PPMDebug.isLoggingEnabled = function () {
    var debugValue = gs.getProperty(PPMDebug.PROJECT_DEBUG_PROPERTY, 'false');
    if(debugValue && debugValue == 'true')
        return true;
    return false;
};

PPMDebug.isSessionDebug = function () {
    var debugValue = GlideSessionDebug.isDebugging('log');
    if(debugValue)
        return true;
    return false;
};

PPMDebug.log = function(msg) {
    if(PPMDebug.isSessionDebug() || PPMDebug.isLoggingEnabled()) {
        gs.log(msg, "PPM");
    }  
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-02-17 17:43:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>95f29e309f013200598a5bb0657fcf82</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PPMDebug</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_95f29e309f013200598a5bb0657fcf82</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-02-17 17:56:32</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>682</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
